abstract: NFL Roundup; St Louis Rams owner Stan Kroenke says he plans to build 80,000-seat football stadium in Inglewood, Calif; plan is latest chapter in continuing story about when, or whether, an NFL team will return to Los Angeles; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stan Kroenke announced plans to build an 80,000-seat stadium that would rise in proximity to a city that has been without an N.F.L. team for two decades.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and BEN SHPIGEL

snippet: Stan Kroenke announced plans to build an 80,000-seat stadium that would rise in proximity to a city that has been without an N.F.L. team for two decades.

headline.main: Rams Owner Stan Kroenke Reveals Plan for Field in Los Angeles Area
headline.print_headline: Rams Owner Plans Stadium in California
